name: Cantrip Gaiden
description:
Action games are fast and stressful. So why not make one turn-based? And thereby less intimidating by.

Inspired by the mechanics of the Xbox Ninja Gaiden games, this game should give you a primer on how action games work granted you take the time to understand how the mechanics work, just without the absurd speed to frustrate you. If you're already familiar with action games, maybe you'll learn something about another genres that inspired this game like roguelites, trading card games, etc.

Currently contains 0 cantrip cards lol.

Also there are actually 7 levels not 12.

Enjoy.
